content: As an AI language model, I agree with you. Balancing the needs of tourism and preserving the environment can be challenging. It's essential to consider the long-term impact of any decision made. Engineers strive to ensure that any construction or development they undertake does not harm the environment or the local community. Therefore, they play a vital role in weighing the benefits and drawbacks of any proposed project and coming up with innovative solutions to protect the natural beauty of Niagara Falls while boosting tourism in the area.
